actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education.

official_title: To provide assistance to Florida Memorial College in Miami, Florida, for asbestos removal.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Education to provide funds to assist Florida Memorial College in Miami, Florida, in carrying out the removal of asbestos-containing material from certain buildings of such College and for necessary restoration and renovation thereafter. Authorizes appropriations for such assistance.

titles.title: To provide assistance to Florida Memorial College in Miami, Florida, for asbestos removal.
